attributes.action: Stop giving people 3 points for speeding. Police could catch real crime
attributes.background: Fed up of people going 35 in 30 getting 3 points and £100. Easy money for the police but not real crime. Focus resources elsewhere instead of continuously taking advantage of the tax payer. Maybe move down the amount of time points are on your licence from 3/4 years to 1.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are operational for the police, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're also not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It is not clear what you mean by "real crime".
